name: A Card Master's Awakening
description:
A Card Master's Awakening

This is a game inspired by card games like Slay the Spire and mathematical games like 24. Drag cards onto numbers (either those embedded in the world or those on other cards) to apply the effect. Hover on the characters (or touch, if on a mobile device) to inspect their needs. The random seed changes every hour.

Sound assets used in this game:

  • https://freesound.org/people/AncientOracle/sounds/476871/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Opossum/sounds/22342/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Raclure/sounds/483598/
  • https://freesound.org/people/ThePig01/sounds/588666/
  • https://freesound.org/people/TripleDStudios8/sounds/194467/
  • https://freesound.org/people/ZeritFreeman/sounds/472277/
  • https://freesound.org/people/balloonhead/sounds/364751/
  • https://freesound.org/people/by.hathor/sounds/491490/
  • https://freesound.org/people/silversatyr/sounds/333265/
  • https://freesound.org/people/suntemple/sounds/253177/
  • https://freesound.org/people/unadamlar/sounds/476178/
  • https://freesound.org/people/zapama/sounds/87083/

If you get stuck in the final scene, here's a hint (spoilers): create a five-digit number, three of which are the same number, the remaining two are another same number, like a full house hand in a poker game.
